commands: SDK_DIR=$(find .next/standalone -path '*/node_modules/@github/copilot-sdk' -type d | head -1) && if [ -n "$SDK_DIR" ]; then cp -rL node_modules/@github/copilot "$(dirname $SDK_DIR)/copilot"; echo '✅ Copied @github/copilot to standalone'; else echo '⚠ copilot-sdk not found in standalone, skipping copy'; fi
